com.guidewire.ab.external.entity

Interface RootInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface RootInfo
extends gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    null

      • getExcludeReason

        java.lang.String getExcludeReason()
        Deprecated. 
        Reason for excluding or skipping the entity from archiving. If the ExcludeFromArchive bit is set, this gives the reason for excluding. Else, if this is not null, it is the reason for skipping.

      • setExcludeReason

        void setExcludeReason(java.lang.String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Reason for excluding or skipping the entity from archiving. If the ExcludeFromArchive bit is set, this gives the reason for excluding. Else, if this is not null, it is the reason for skipping.

      • canRestore

        boolean canRestore()
        Deprecated. 
        This method will return true if this object can be restored at this time. There are two possible reason why this would be false. 1. the object was not archived in the first place; 2. The archive source is not currently available
        Returns:
        true if okay to restore

      • reportArchiveProblem

        void reportArchiveProblem(java.lang.String message)
        Deprecated. 
        Report an issue that prevents this item from being archived. Usually called by a rule when it has determined that the item is not ready to be archived yet. Unlike skipFromArchiving(), this method does not return immediately and subsequent rules are processed.
        Parameters:
        message - The reason for skipping.

      • resetToPreArchivedState

        void resetToPreArchivedState()
        Deprecated. 
        Reset flag that marks the graph as excluded for archiving

      • scheduleForArchive

        void scheduleForArchive()
        Deprecated. 
        Schedule this item for archival

      • setPublicIDOfRoot_Method

        void setPublicIDOfRoot_Method(java.lang.String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the root public ID to the passed value.
        Parameters:
        value - value for the root public ID.

      • skipFromArchiving

        void skipFromArchiving(java.lang.String message)
        Deprecated. 
        Skip archival of this item. Usually called by a rule when it has determined that the item is not ready to be archived yet. Unlike reportArchiveProblem(), this method returns immediately and no more rules are processed.
        Parameters:
        message - The reason for skipping.
